title: 구조강도 및 최적설계 연구실
content:

공과대학

주요연구분야
Materials Behavior, Novel Materials
Metals/Alloys, Composites, Rubber Superplastic Forming, Vacuum Hot Pressing, Hot Isostatic Pressing, Diffusion Bonding, etc
Stress and Failure Analysis, Creep and Fatigue Design
Computational Modeling and Analysis for Materials/Structures from the Nano to Micro Scales
Reliability Analysis for Structural and Smart Materials through the Destructive & Non-destructive Testing and Finite Element Simulations
